list.name: repo_id
list.label: Repo
list.query: SELECT repo AS __text, repo AS __value FROM repos ORDER BY repo

targets.rawSql: SELECT m.day AS time, r.repo AS metric, argMax(m.incidents_count, m.computed_at) AS value FROM incident_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

targets.rawSql: SELECT m.day AS time, concat(r.repo, ' p50') AS metric, argMax(m.mttr_p50_hours, m.computed_at) AS value FROM incident_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day

SELECT m.day AS time, concat(r.repo, ' p90') AS metric, argMax(m.mttr_p90_hours, m.computed_at) AS value FROM incident_metrics_daily AS m INNER JOIN repos AS r ON r.id = m.repo_id WHERE match(r.repo, '${repo_id:regex}') AND m.day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND m.day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY m.day, metric ORDER BY m.day
